Package bzh.bmv.bcf.model

Class Comment

  • java.lang.Object
    • bzh.bmv.bcf.model.Comment
  • @Entity
public class Comment
extends java.lang.Object

    Comment class

    The class comment implements one comment. A comment may contain other comment(s).
    Since:
    2018-09-07
